title: (x) "Ultimate" tall narrow Art Deco sans - various alternatives {gang}
content:
I just cannot seem to figure this one out. I can upload a PDF if anyone needs a clearer copy. Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Ultimate-Text_3571.gif)

| --- | --- |

 [‹ (x) Optima-like "The New West" - Stettler {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34729 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 80s style neon script - Vegas {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34766 "Go to next forum topic")
author: OptimusChyme

comments.content:
It reminds me of Newport but ooh, it’s a mess. That U is awful, the stresses on the A don’t match. I think you should just use Newport or something similar.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/newport-classic-sg/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/newport-classic-sg/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/newport-classic-sg/regular/")
Patty, I think this was scanned and “cleaned up” before they sent it to me. :(

Others: [URW Newport Land](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_newport_land_normal/&sample_text=ULTIMATE&sample_size=144) and [Washington](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226163953/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/washington_regular_ot_std/&sample_text=ULTIMATE&sample_size=130).

Go ahead and attach the PDF to your entry.
I don’t think we’ll get any closer on this one.
